issues.description: Hero CTA placement may fail 8-second comprehension test without clear visual dominance hierarchy
issues.rationale: Primary/secondary CTA distinction unclear - users may hesitate or miss conversion path entirely

issues.description: Sticky CTA behavior creates inconsistent conversion path between mobile and desktop experiences
issues.rationale: Desktop users lose conversion continuity while mobile gets sticky - conversion rate disparity likely

issues.description: Pricing table interaction pattern adds friction to comparison flow for high-intent users
issues.rationale: Collapsed-by-default requires extra clicks when users need immediate tier comparison for decisions

issues.description: Audit log pattern lacks clear scanning hierarchy and may appear as decorative rather than functional
issues.rationale: Trust elements need immediate visual weight - subtle presentation reduces credibility impact

issues.description: Section reordering buries pricing too deep in scroll flow for conversion-focused users
issues.rationale: Price-sensitive users may abandon before reaching pricing section - increases scroll fatigue

issues.description: Hero layout 60/40 split may compress value proposition text below mobile readability threshold
issues.rationale: 3-bullet summary in constrained space risks becoming scanning noise rather than clarity aid

issues.description: Proof bar placement timing may interrupt hero-to-action flow on mobile devices
issues.rationale: Under hero preview creates visual gap between value prop and CTA - breaks conversion momentum

issues.description: Type scale hierarchy gap between H1 48px and H2 32px may create visual rhythm disruption
issues.rationale: 16px jump feels abrupt - intermediate sizing needed for section transitions and scannability

issues.description: Card padding uniformity at 16px ignores content density requirements across different sections
issues.rationale: Pricing cards need different spacing than feature cards - one-size approach reduces effectiveness

issues.description: Button hierarchy padding difference too subtle to create clear primary/secondary distinction
issues.rationale: 4px padding difference insufficient for thumb-friendly mobile tapping and visual priority

suggestedFixes.fix: Make primary CTA 48px height with 24px padding, secondary CTA 40px height with 16px padding, 16px vertical gap
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates unmistakable visual hierarchy for 8-second comprehension test

suggestedFixes.fix: Add desktop sticky CTA after 60% scroll, same 48px height as mobile version, consistent behavior across devices
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains conversion path continuity and prevents desktop conversion rate drops

suggestedFixes.fix: Show comparison table expanded by default on desktop, collapsed on mobile with prominent 'Compare Plans' toggle
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes for device context - desktop has space, mobile needs progressive disclosure

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 20px bold headers, 14px timestamps, 2px left border accent, 24px vertical spacing between log entries
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates scannable trust hierarchy that reads as functional rather than decorative

suggestedFixes.fix: Move pricing section to position 4 after How it Works, before Visibility section, add pricing preview in hero
suggestedFixes.rationale: Reduces scroll fatigue for price-sensitive users while maintaining mechanism explanation flow

suggestedFixes.fix: Adjust to 65/35 split on desktop, ensure 3-bullet summary uses 18px text with 28px line-height for readability
suggestedFixes.rationale: Provides more space for value proposition while maintaining preview visibility

suggestedFixes.fix: Position proof bar directly under hero CTAs on both desktop and mobile, 32px top margin, 24px bottom margin
suggestedFixes.rationale: Maintains conversion flow momentum while providing immediate trust reinforcement

suggestedFixes.fix: Add H3 at 24px and H4 at 20px to type scale, maintain 1.5 line-height ratio across all heading levels
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates smoother visual rhythm and provides more granular hierarchy options for sections

suggestedFixes.fix: Use 20px padding for pricing cards, 16px for feature cards, 12px for proof chips, context-appropriate sizing
suggestedFixes.rationale: Optimizes card density for content type and improves scanning efficiency

suggestedFixes.fix: Primary buttons 20px padding, secondary buttons 12px padding, 8px minimum padding difference for clear hierarchy
suggestedFixes.rationale: Creates thumb-friendly mobile targets and unmistakable visual priority distinction
